string-array.name: dts_game_sound_string_mode_tag
string-array.item: Enhanced sound field surround effect, easy to locate enemies, suitable for FPS games
The game music effect, suitable for MOBA, music games
Voice more clear and real, suitable for RPG, board game
Improve low frequency performance and make chicken eating games easier to recognize footsteps

string-array.name: game_control_centre_performance_tips_array
string-array.item: Silver core priority, restrict temperature, minimum power consumption
Silver core priority, suitable for simple games
Gold core priority, restrict temperature, suitable for normal 3D-games
Gold core priority, suitable for high quality 3D-games
Gold core only, maximum performance by also maximum power consumption

string-array.name: mode_description_array
string-array.item: Balance between performance and power consumption, and provide a balanced performance solution for general games
Strengthen phone performance, suitable for games with high requirements for image quality
Ultimate performance for games, attached cooler is recommended

string-array.name: tencent_performance_tips_array
string-array.item: Balance Mode: Balance between performance and power consumption, and provide a balanced performance solution for general games
SolarCore Mode: Strengthen phone performance, suitable for games with high requirements for image quality
Ludicrous Mode: Bring phones to extreme performance, which may cause the phones to heat up noticeably
Extreme Ludicrous Mode: Forbid all background functions to keep phones maintain peak performance, which may cause the phones to heat up significantly
